summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of North and East 95th Street from Meridian Ave. to Corliss Ave. and from 1st Ave. Northeast to 5th Ave. Northeast; and certain other streets and avenues; by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 18665 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds."
